lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Masked Wolf
[00:00.22] What you know about rollin' down in the deep?
[00:03.59] When your brain goes numb, you can call that mental freeze
[00:06.87] When these people talk too much, put that sh1t in slow motion, yeah
[00:10.42] I feel like an astronaut in the ocean, ayy
[00:13.62] What you know about rollin' down in the deep?
[00:16.52] When your brain goes numb, you can call that mental freeze
[00:19.61] When these people talk too much, put that sh1t in slow motion, ayy
[00:23.22] I feel like an astronaut in the ocean
[00:26.02] She say that I'm cool
[00:27.16] I'm like "yeah, that's true"
[00:29.44] I believe in G-O-D
[00:30.66] Don't believe in T-H-O-T
[00:32.32] She keeps playing me dumb
[00:33.78] Ima play her for fun
[00:35.30] Y'all don't really know my mental
[00:36.71] Lemme give you the picture like stencil
[00:38.34] Falling out, in a drought
[00:39.98] No flow, rain wasn't pouring down
[00:41.68] See, that pain was all around
[00:43.20] See, my mode was kinda lounged
[00:44.92] Didn't know which way to turn
[00:46.48] Flow was cool but I still felt burnt
[00:47.98] Energy up, you can feel my surge
[00:49.79] Ima kill everything like this purge
[00:51.50] Put this sh1t in a frame, better know I don't blame
[00:53.23] Everything that I say, man I seen you deflate
[00:54.79] Let me elevate, this ain't a prank
[00:56.07] Have you walkin' on a plank, la-la-la-la-la, like
[00:57.81] Pass the baton, back and I'm on
[00:58.90] Swimming in the pool, Kendrick Lammar, uh
[01:00.34] Want a piece of this, a piece of mine, my peace of sign
[01:02.84] Can you please read between the lines?
[01:03.90] My rhyme's inclined to break your spine
[01:05.63] They say that I'm so fine
[01:07.28] You could never match my grind
[01:08.90] Please do not waste my time
[01:10.77] What you know about rollin' down in the deep?
[01:14.00] When you brain goes numb, you can call that mental freeze
[01:17.26] When these people talk too much, put that sh1t in slow motion, yeah
[01:20.80] I feel like an astronaut in the ocean, ayy
[01:23.90] What you know about rollin' down in the deep?
[01:26.89] When your brain goes numb, you can call that mental freeze
[01:30.10] When these people talk too much, put that sh1t in slow motion, ayy
[01:33.68] I feel like an astronaut in the ocean
tlyric:
[by:立落]
[00:00.22]滚下深渊的感觉 你知道多少
[00:03.59]当你大脑麻木时 你可以说精神被冻结了
[00:06.87]当这些人说太多话 就把这个过程变成慢动作
[00:10.42]我感觉像是在海里的宇航员
[00:13.62]滚下深渊的感觉 你知道多少
[00:16.52]当你大脑麻木时 你可以说精神被冻结了
[00:19.61]当这些人说太多话 就把这个过程变成慢动作
[00:23.22]我感觉像是在海里的宇航员
[00:26.02]她说我很酷
[00:27.16]我觉得她说的没错
[00:29.44]我相信上帝
[00:30.66]不相信女人
[00:32.32]她总是把我当傻子
[00:33.78]我也要玩弄她一下
[00:35.30]你们都不了解我的心理
[00:36.71]让我给你描述一下这个画面
[00:38.34]大吵一架 缺乏激情
[00:39.98]没有甜言蜜语 我喝酒买醉
[00:41.68]你看 痛苦无处不在
[00:43.20]我的状态有点慵懒
[00:44.92]不知道该往哪里走
[00:46.48]音乐很酷 但我还是感觉心如火烧
[00:47.98]精力充沛 你能感受到我的激情
[00:49.79]我会保持内心的激情 不断前行 永不止步
[00:51.50]把这玩意儿珍藏起来 但我知道我不怪谁
[00:53.23]朋友 我看着所有事情都反映出你已泄气
[00:54.79]让我帮你振作起来 这不是恶作剧
[00:56.07]你可曾踏过木板
[00:57.81]传递接力棒
[00:58.90]我在泳池里游弋 感受Kendrick Lamar的压力
[01:00.34]想要尝尝这滋味 寻求内心平静
[01:02.84]你能否明白字里行间的意思
[01:03.90]我的歌要会你受不了
[01:05.63]他们说我好棒
[01:07.28]你永远无法达到我这样的成绩
[01:08.90]请不要浪费我的时间
[01:10.77]滚下深渊的感觉 你知道多少
[01:14.00]当你大脑麻木时 你可以说精神被冻结了
[01:17.26]当这些人说太多话 就把这个过程变成慢动作
[01:20.80]我感觉像是在海里的宇航员
[01:23.90]滚下深渊的感觉 你知道多少
[01:26.89]当你大脑麻木时 你可以说精神被冻结了
[01:30.10]当这些人说太多话 就把这个过程变成慢动作
[01:33.68]我感觉像是在海里的宇航员
